scripts.build: npm run clean && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify ] src/index.js -o lib/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
scripts.watch: npm run clean && ./node_modules/.bin/watchify src/index.js -t [ babelify ] -o lib/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify ] tests/index.js -o lib-tests/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
scripts.watch-test: npm run clean-test && ./node_modules/.bin/watchify tests/index.js -t [ babelify ] -o lib-tests/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
